name: closed immersion
description: A morphism $f : X \to Y$ of schemes is a closed immersion if $i$ induces a homeomorphism of the underlying topological space of $X$ onto a closed subset of that of $Y$, and furthermore the induced map $f^\# : \mathcal{O}_Y \to f_* \mathcal{O}_X$ of sheaves on $Y$ is surjective.
